TopicTitle: Hello, I am New, and all that Stuff

Articles.Content:
A coworker hooked me on the game. Damn him. I am talking HOOKED. Divorce is imminent. My children no longer know me. My employer has stopped sending paychecks. My yard looks like rural Viet Nam, and the houseplants are all dead.

But Jebediah has walked on Duna and made it home in a single round-trip.

So all is well.
Welcome to the forums, this behavior is normal. Enjoy your stay and remember to fly safe.

Your post's tone seems to indicate some problems, but I don't see any in the text

Welcome

Ah, don't worry about it. It's totally normal. Here, have some cake. All of your problems will disappear.

(You might not get that reference, but some will. It's not from Portal.)
